TopicTitle: Are there Dev tools for mod makers?

Articles.Content:
i have kinda started making mods and mod parts and wanted to test them out and probably get some cool screenshots. Are there some mod tools that can either

* Put me in a certain orbit

OR

* Give me infinite fuel to help with putting me in orbit

I've heard of something called debug toolbar but have no idea where to get these or where to start looking for them. I've even seen a person use this specific toolbar on the "Show off your awesome KSP Pictures" thread.

Any help would be appreciated.
alt+ctrl+del+d... or something like that (I'm not sure about that 'd')
nope doesn't work. Bump for any other suggestions please.
Darn. I knew it was something like that...
Wow, really, well, I can now rendez-vous directly?
